official_title: A resolution to reaffirm the use of our national motto on currency.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of the Congress that the national motto, "In God We Trust," shall be reaffirmed and shall continue to be engraved and printed on currency.

titles.title: A resolution to reaffirm the use of our national motto on currency.
